nodes.text: A B1 battle droid was stationed on the planet Felucia during the events of the Second Battle of Felucia.

During the Battle of Felucia around 21 BBY, this B1-Series battle droid along with many other battle droids was sent by Separatist forces as reinforcements to an outpost on the planet Felucia, and was under command of T-series tactical droid TZ-33. When a team of clone troopers lead by Jedi generals Plo Koon and Anakin Skywalker and commander Ahsoka Tano arrived on the planet to take down the Separatist stronghold, TZ-33 ordered all of the droids inside the facility to form up for a counter attack and engage the Republicans in battle. In the end the battle was lost by the Separatist forces and all of the droids, including this one, were destroyed.
This B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
